list.exp: 缪斯或庇厄利亚的女神们
list.abs: 为缪斯或庇厄利亚的女神们（pierides），因她们生于庇厄利亚地方。她们是卡拉培(calliope，雄辩和叙事诗)，克利欧(clio，历史)， …

list.exp: 爲缪斯或庇厄利亚的女神们

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous pale-colored butterflies having three pairs of well-developed legs

auth_sentence.content: Most pierid butterflies are white, yellow or orange in coloration, often with black spots.
